ðŸ“– Summary: HandBrake is an open-source video transcoder that converts videos into formats compatible with various devices, including mobile phones, tablets, TVs, and web browsers. It supports common video file formats and leverages tools like FFmpeg, x264, and x265 to create MP4, MKV, or WebM video files.
